#### 1. In the same notebook for **Log Metric Anomaly Baselines**, after completing the DQL > Open the side menu with ... and select Open With
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dynatrace-wwse/workshop-dynatrace-log-analytics/refs/heads/main/assets/images/metrics-davis-anomaly-detection_open_with_davis_anomaly_detection.png)
####     2. Open with Davis Anomaly Detection
####     3. Define the alert conditions, choose **Auto adaptive threshold** with a signal fluctuation of **1**
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dynatrace-wwse/workshop-dynatrace-log-analytics/refs/heads/main/assets/images/metrics-davis-anomaly-detection_anomaly_detection_define_alert_condition.png)
####     4. Configure the event details, adding the **Title** and **Event name**
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dynatrace-wwse/workshop-dynatrace-log-analytics/refs/heads/main/assets/images/metrics-davis-anomaly-detection_anomaly_detection_add_details.png)
####     5. Check-out the GB scan size for DQL Query - it should be 0 bytes
####     6. Press Create to save
